pages package

Submodules

pages.2EDA module

pages.3EDAMAP module

pages.3EDAMAP.create_map(filtered_df, zoom_level)

Creates a folium map with markers representing neighborhoods and their information.

Parameters:

filtered_df (pandas.DataFrame): The filtered dataframe containing neighborhood information. zoom_level (int): The initial zoom level of the map.

Returns:

folium.Map: The created folium map.

pages.3EDAMAP.load_data(file_path)

Loads and returns the data from the specified file path.

Parameters:

file_path (str): The path to the CSV file.

Returns:

pandas.DataFrame: The loaded data.

pages.3EDAMAP.main()

The main function that runs the Streamlit application.

pages.5ML module

Machine Learning Page

This script creates a page in streamlit with multiple tabs detailing the Machine Learning aspect of the dashboard, including the embedded algorithm.

Usage:

  • Runs automatically after the 1INTRODUCTION page is initiated

Dependencies:

  • streamlit

  • pandas

  • sklearn
